text: Wellsford (MƒÅori: Whakapirau) is a town on the Northland Peninsula in northern New Zealand. It is a major town located 77 kilometers north of Auckland and situated on State Highway 1 and State Highway 16. It has six primary schools and one high school situated within the area. Its private school closed at the end of 2018 due to falling numbers. ==References== Category:Rodney Local Board Area Category:Towns in Auckland Region
title: Wellsford
